General.Name: Bodegas Riojanas S.A
General.Description: Bodegas Riojanas, S.A. engages in winemaking business in Spain and internationally. It offers its wine products under the Monte Real, Pascali, Pierrel, Viña Albina, Puerta Vieja, Gran Albina, El Lago, Viore, Borisa, Peñamonte, Cum Laude, Pregón, Marqués de Peñamonte, Marquis De La Fayette, Veiga Naúm, Gargalo, Alacer, Albina, Bernard Remy, and Canchales brand names. Bodegas Riojanas, S.A. was founded in 1890 and is based in Cenicero, Spain.
General.Address: Avda. Dr. Ricardo Ruiz AzcArraga, 1, Cenicero, Spain, 26350
